allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Email Fixer project

This is a complete, production-ready Email Validation SPA built with:
- .NET 8 backend (ASP.NET Core Web API)
- Blazor WebAssembly frontend
- PostgreSQL database with Entity Framework Core
- Paddle.com payment integration
- Docker containerization
- Google Cloud Run deployment ready
- GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline

Features:
- Single & batch email validation
- Regex format checking
- MX record verification
- Typo detection and suggestions
- Disposable email detection
- User accounts with credit system
- Payment processing via Paddle
- Full API with Swagger documentation
- Responsive Blazor UI
- Production deployment guides

All 6 development phases completed:
1. Database setup (EF Core, migrations)
2. API development (11 endpoints)
3. Blazor client (8 components, services)
4. Docker containerization
5. GCP deployment & CI/CD
6. Documentation (CLAUDE.md, README.md)

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")
